articles.title: Apple Awards Hacker $100,000 for Discovering 'Sign in with Apple' Vulnerability - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Apple has awarded $100,000 to a hacker for having uncovered a serious security flaw in its 'Sign in with Apple' option.
articles.content: Apple's useful Sign in with Apple option that was disclosed in June 2019 received a fair bit of positive attention, and for good reason: it replaces social logins with a secure authentication system.… [+2036 chars]
